params.notes: Prioritized on-grounds spots that open before first trips so riders can fuel up without leaving stabling.

results.name: Dark Horse Coffee Co.
best_for: first-cup caffeine before the warm-up ring
results.quick_order: Drip or latte + muffin/scone; in/out before schooling.
results.insider_tips: Hit this on the walk from stabling; lines move fast between jog strip and early trips.

results.name: The International Grille & Café
results.quick_order: Egg sandwich + fruit cup; back to the warm-up in one coffee.
results.insider_tips: Go just after course walk to miss the rush; easy access from vendor row side.
